DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, parallel-group, placebo-controlled study of the efficacy, safety, and pharmacokinetics of SAGE-547 Injection in adult female subjects diagnosed with severe postpartum depression
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate SAGE-547 in Patients With Severe Postpartum Depression
DOC.criteria: Key Subject either must have ceased lactating at Screening; or if still lactating at Screening, must have already fully and permanently weaned their infant(s) from breastmilk; or if still actively breastfeeding at Screening, must agree to cease giving breastmilk to their infant(s) prior to receiving study drug.
